resources.string: I\'m Asgar a Android Developer| I am currently pursuing a Master of Computer Application (MCA) from RKDF University. I have a diverse set of skills, ranging from HTML, CSS, and JavaScript , Java, and Dart. I love what I am doing, and I am passionate about coding and solving problems through code. I am excited to work alongside other amazing programmers and continue learning and growing! Asgar72 is the username of Asgar Abbas, an Android developer and a Master of Computer Application (MCA) student from RKDF University. He has a portfolio website1 where he showcases his skills, projects, and contact information. He also has a GitHub profile2 where he has 30 repositories, 2 stars, and 358 contributions in the last year. Some of his projects include a Notes App, a Unit Converter with Calculator App, a Face Detection App, and an app that provides information regarding Azadari events in Jaunpur City3. He is passionate about coding and solving problems through code. He is currently looking for an internship in Android development.
